director.name: 维瑞娜·帕拉韦尔 Verena Paravel
吕西安·卡斯坦因-泰勒 Lucien Castaing-Taylor

introduction: Leading thinkers try their hardest to answer this unanswerable question.  Interviewees include Kwame Anthony Appiah, Emanuele Coccia, Vinciane Despret, Amitav Ghosh, Stephen Greenblatt, Olivia Judson, Bruno Latour, Mariana Mazzucato, Joia Mukherjee, Mary Robinson, Dani Rodrick, Saskia Sassen, and Richard Sennett. Venice Architecture Biennale 2021.
